moves.1. e4 c5 2. Nf3 Nc6 3. d4 cxd4 4. Nxd4 Q: called the "Grivas" sicilian in the name of Greek GM Grivas who used to play it a lot. All this suite is theoric till the 15th move ..
moves.5. Nb3 Nf6 6. Nc3 e6 7. Bd3 Be7 8. O-O a: the only game i found in my database, played by GM. Grivas (2505) with black against Zoltar Almasi (2610) in Kopavogur (Island) 1994 (1/2-1/2). Here Almasi played Bxc3.
moves.16. Nxc3:
this move is right too. 
all the following moves are analyzed with fritz 8
moves.17... Qd7: fritz proposes Qb8 and gives "=" for the position
moves.19. Nxd4:
best move for fritz
white knight found a good position, and at this time i thought that black position was a little under.
that is not true, as fritz propose now Ba6 with a draw position.
moves.19... Bb7: this thematic move is also playable, and this is the second best move for fritz
moves.20... g6:
bad move !!! deteriorating the pawn structure, giving access to black squares, 
fritz gives  = for white ( 0.78) with f4-f5 following for white  
Ba6 was much better
moves.21... exf5:
2nd best move for fritz that recommands e5
black stay with a bad evaluation (-1.00)
moves.22... Bd5: a difficult move to find, but the best for fritz ! it protects e6, to avoid Ke6
moves.23. Bb5:
best move for fritz
a good move that maintain the pressure.
moves.23... Qb7:
best move for fritz
keep a pressure on g2.
moves.24. Bg5:
fritz proposed Bh6 with  1.16. 
here the position is nearly draw
now black have not a lot of moves, but Ke4 is to be studied with attention
moves.24... Ne4:
best move for fritz
it was a little breath for black
At now, i can say that white have done a good work, except their last move, and fritz evaluates the position with an advance of half a pawn for white. 
black have well played also, except g6, that was a big mistake.
moves.25. Bh6:
fritz proposed Bxe7 ( 0.47) 
white move is drawing
moves.25... Rfd8:
fritz was recommanding Bf6

now he gives the following suite for white

1. � (0.78): 25. Te1xe4 Fd5xe4 26.f5-f6 Fe7xf6 27.Tf1xf6 Db7-d5 28.Dh3-c3 Fe4xg2  29.Rh1-g1 Dd5-e5
moves.26. fxg6: well, that was a breath again for black
moves.26... hxg6 27. Rf4:
the best move for fritz 
now fritz recommands to let the knight here and proposes Rdb8
moves.28... Rac8:
a little  = for white ( 0.44)

white missed the following suite
1.  - (1.59): 13.Dh3-c3 f7-f6 14.Fb5-c6 Fd5xc6 15.Cd4xc6 Td8-d7 16.Cc6xe7  Td7xe7 17.Te1xe7 Db7xe7 18.Tf4xf6 Rg8-h7 19.Fh6-g5
moves.29. Nf5:
i was waiting for this move !
for the first time, the evaluation is better for black, (-0.91), despite the white supremacy !
fritz gives Bf6, i saw it but the position was really too complex
moves.29... Ne6:
a simple move, but totally wrong !
fritz gives Ba6, with  1,75 for white , and my opponent and me did not see it. difficult to find it in a such complicated position
moves.30. Nxe7+ Qxe7 31. Rf5:
at this time i saw a very good move for black.
fritz gives  1.75 for black in this suite ! i was lucky
moves.31... Nf4: incredible ! Queen e7 is not takeable, (Rc1 mates). g2 and Re1 are attacked, there is no defense that doesn't loose material
moves.32. Rxf4 Qxe1+ 33. Rf1 Qe4: a big blunder but the match was so difficult !
moves.34. Qxe4 Bxe4 35. Bxa4 Rca8:
i proposed draw, and my Russian opponent accepted. the same day, Russia was eliminated from european football cup against spain 3-0. anyway it was a great  team !!
thanks to my opponent, krotenok, and nice to meat you ! 
a very tactical match, with a lot of opportunities.
